definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album

sentences.english: Mr. Blare was invited to be in charge of lightening of stage.
sentences.chinese: 布萊爾先生被邀負責舞臺的燈光設計。

sentences.english: Within the UK, there is no means of prosecuting Blair.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，沒有起訴布萊爾的手段。

sentences.english: Bush and Blair later failed to obtain security council authorisation.
sentences.chinese: 布什和布萊爾後來未能獲得安理會授權。

sentences.english: Blair was a self-styled regular guy with buckets of charm.
sentences.chinese: 布萊爾風度翩翩，自詡爲受歡迎的人。

sentences.english: I watched the debate last week between Christopher Hitchens and Tony Blair.
sentences.chinese: 上星期我看了克里斯多弗息金斯和託尼布萊爾的辯論。

sentences.english: Across the Atlantic, Blair's chunky memoir will seem even more antique.
sentences.chinese: 大洋對岸，布萊爾厚厚實實的自傳就更顯得過時。

sentences.english: Issues of the Silver International are available on the Montgomery Blair High School Web site.
sentences.chinese: 《銀泉國際》各期可見蒙哥馬利布萊爾中學網站。

sentences.english: At that moment Blair had been expounding on his work in Sierra Leone.
sentences.chinese: 那時布萊爾正在闡述他在塞拉利昂的工作。

sentences.english: JUST who does Tony Blair think he is?
sentences.chinese: 託尼布萊爾以爲他是誰呀？

sentences.english: The funny thing is, Blair never used drugs.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，布萊爾從未嗑藥。

sentences.english: Dena looked appealingly at Blair, hoping to hear a contrary opinion.
sentences.chinese: 德娜懇切地看着布萊爾，希望聽到相反的觀點。

sentences.english: Was it her fiancé Louis or her secret-lover Chuck?
sentences.chinese: 是布萊爾的未婚夫路易斯王子還是祕密情人查克？

sentences.english: Blair hope SaiLin think well, to make the right choice.
sentences.chinese: 布萊爾希望賽琳好好想想，再做出正確選擇。

sentences.english: He seldom faces protests, let alone investigating magistrates.
sentences.chinese: 布萊爾很少面臨着抗議，更遑論調查官了。

sentences.english: A spokesman for Blair last night declined to comment on the godfather link.
sentences.chinese: 布萊爾的發言人昨晚拒絕就教父這層關係發表評論。

sentences.english: This was the central British argument in favour of Blair.
sentences.chinese: 這曾是英國支持布萊爾的主要理由。

definition: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), Canadian federal and national police force/Mounties
the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Hong2 Shi2 zi4 hui4
